DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the effects of oral L-arginine administration on pregnant women at second trimester of gestation with chronic hypertension, respect with placebo.
DOC.brief_title: L-arginine Effects on Chronic Hypertension in Pregnancy
DOC.criteria: Pregnant women between 1820 weeks of gestation with chronic hypertension Other maternal or fetal systemic disease
